title: The Fourth Day of Christmas, Boosted
author: VD
content_html:
On the fourth day of Christmas, John Bradley gave to me: a ballad in two-part harmony

  • Silent Night
  • Let It Snow
  • Hallelujah
  • All I Want for Christmas

DISCUSS ON SG
content_text:
On the fourth day of Christmas, John Bradley gave to me: a ballad in two-part harmony

Let It Snow
